content: st on ndl run yarn through first sl slip st on back ndl pwise and drop st off ndl run yarn through st s stitch es second st kwise keep st on ndl repeat from * until one st ws wrong side rem on each ndl run yarn through last st on front ndl * repeat the directions between the asterisks as kwise and drop st off ndl run yarn through last st on many times as indicated back ndl pwise and drop st off ndl note adjust gauge as you go so the sts match the special methods gauge of the sts on the knitted piece crochet provisional co notes cowl is worked in the round in one piece using waste yarn make a sl knot and place on hk chain 5 holding ndl in left hand and hk in right hand bring yarn behind ndl bring hk in front of ndl *yarn over hk and in order to stay within the specified yarn amounts 1 mini draw through loop on hk 1 st co take yarn back behind hank per color use long tail cast on check your gauge ndl repeat from * to desired number of sts fo waste yarn frequently throughout the project and leave tails between 3 and 5 stranded color a method of color knitting in which two or more yarns are to adjust the circumference cast on more or fewer worked at the same time with yarns not in use stranded stitches in multiples of 4 please note that this will affect the total yardage loosely across the wrong side of the piece blue sky fibers blue sky fibers using c22 and c23 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of neck warmer chart cut c22 using c23 and c24 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c23 with scrap yarn co 84 sts using the crochet provisional co using c24 and c25 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c24 using c1 as color a knit round 1 of chart pm and join in the round being careful not to twist sts using c25 and c26 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c25 using c1 and c2 as colors a and b work rnds 2-5 of chart cut c1 using c26 and c27 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c26 using c2 and c3 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c2 do not bobble do not cut yarn place sts on hold using c3 and c4 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c3 finishing using c4 and c5 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c4 weave in all ends except c27 block to finished dimensions using c5 and c6 as colors a and b work rnds 1-5 of chart cut c5 return held sts to ndl remove provisional
